ygData.msgSnippet: The robot strugled to stand up, and weakly gurgled some sounds, then spat up some fuel, Sorry he said, and then put out his hand, in a gesture of friendship,

Subject: Re: Rude Awakening
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

The robot strugled to stand up, and weakly gurgled some sounds, then spat
up some fuel, "Sorry" he said, and then put out his hand, in a gesture of
friendship, "Thanks" he said, to Prowls response on his friends. "I am
Fire.. I am Fire. huhhh" he murmured as he colapsed, and his computer began
to speak, "Unit Firedrill, is in stasis lock, due to energon depletion".
